nodemcu-tools.terminal.scrollbackSize.de: How many lines will be held in terminal. Old lines over this limit will be discarded.
nodemcu-tools.terminal.commandHistorySiz: How many commands will be available by pressing UP in command input field. Old commands over this limit will be discarded.
nodemcu-tools.minifyLua.enabled.descript: Controls whether the Lua code should be minified before upload with 'sendLine' and 'sendBlock' commands.
nodemcu-tools.minifyJSON.enabled.descrip: Controls whether a JSON file should be minified before uploading to the device.
nodemcu-tools.overwriteSnippets.descript: Controls whether snippets in workspace should overwrite ones in user settings and defaults
nodemcu-tools.deviceFilterActive.descrip: Controls whether device filter is active - only known NodeMCU devices (USB vendor-id) will be listed.
nodemcu-tools.connectionDelay.descriptio: Connection delay (in milliseconds) between opening the serial device and starting the communication.
nodemcu-tools.views.explorer.name: NodeMCU Devices
